name: Beyond The Light (Waygone, farmdogs)
description:
STORY

The knights of lightonia have started expanding their kingdom! Greedily taking up sacred land and cultivating ancient soil, they stir the ghosts of the past with their villages, ghosts who want nothing more than to exist peacefully in the dark. You must stop them from encroaching on your home, but be wary, the closer you get the more dangerous it will become.

CONTROLS

Movement - Arrow Keys

Dash - Z 

Attack/Interact - X 

Destroy Light - C

CREDITS

Programming and Level Design - Waygone

Music - jakethehumanjr

Background Art and Main Character Design - Teathling 

Character Art and Animation - farmdogs 

Quality Assurance - Vincent
